## Color4 class

Class used to hold a RBGA color

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Color4 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(r, g, b, a)](./decentraland-ecs.color4.(constructor).md) |  | Creates a new Color4 object from red, green, blue values, all between 0 and 1 |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [a](./decentraland-ecs.color4.a.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the alpha component (between 0 and 1, default is 1) |
|  [b](./decentraland-ecs.color4.b.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the blue component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
|  [g](./decentraland-ecs.color4.g.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the green component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |
|  [r](./decentraland-ecs.color4.r.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Defines the red component (between 0 and 1, default is 0) |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(right)](./decentraland-ecs.color4.add.md) |  | Creates a new Color4 set with the added values of the current Color4 and of the given one |
|  [addInPlace(right)](./decentraland-ecs.color4.addinplace.md) |  | Adds in place the given Color4 values to the current Color4 object |

|  [LerpToRef(left, right, amount, result)](./decentraland-ecs.color4.lerptoref.md) | <code>static</code> | Set the given "result" with the linearly interpolated values of "amount" between the left Color4 object and the right Color4 object |
